skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on this Champion for 2 turns if this attack kills an enemy.
skills.name: Breath Taker

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Mortify

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Block Buffs] debuff and a [Block Active Skills] debuff for 2 turns. This attack is always critical.
skills.name: Sword of Loss

skills.desc: Revives 1 random ally with 50% HP every time this Champion kills an enemy.
skills.name: Great Cycle [P]
